text: I finished converting all the clock demos to a single page and fixed all the navigation/play issues from that logic change. I've done all the other new gitlab issues as well, except for "Gesture recognition -- serious issues" and "After returning to splash screen, no way to get back in", because I am not able to reproduce those specific issues. I'm planning to close all of them and make a merge request in the next few minutes, so I'll post to BaseCamp when that's done.
